pages.purpose: Introduce Matrix OS, its vision as Web 4 and an AI-native operating system where software writes itself. Explain the core concept of Claude Agent SDK as kernel, 'Everything Is a File' principle, and multi-channel access
pages.title: Overview

pages.purpose: Comprehensive overview of system architecture including the three-layer design (kernel, gateway, platform), deployment models, and how components interact
pages.title: Architecture

pages.purpose: Deep dive into the kernel layer: Claude Agent SDK's query() function, IPC MCP server with 25 tools, system prompt construction (~7K tokens), hooks system, and agent execution model
pages.title: Kernel

pages.purpose: Explain the gateway service: Hono HTTP/WebSocket server, dispatcher with serial queue, channel manager, cron service, heartbeat runner, and how it routes requests to the kernel
pages.title: Gateway

pages.purpose: Document the multi-tenant platform service: container orchestration with Dockerode, lifecycle management (start/stop/destroy), port allocation, and idle timeout
pages.title: Platform

pages.purpose: Describe the Next.js shell application: Desktop window manager, ChatPanel, InputBar, command palette, spatial memory, and desktop modes
pages.title: Shell

pages.purpose: Overview of deployment strategies, environment configuration, and infrastructure requirements
pages.title: Deployment

pages.purpose: Guide for running Matrix OS locally: matrixos CLI commands, starting gateway and shell, environment variables, and development workflow
pages.title: Single-User (Local)

pages.purpose: Production deployment on VPS: Cloudflare Tunnel setup, Docker container isolation, subdomain routing, Anthropic API proxy, and resource limits (CPX21 server specs)
pages.title: Multi-Tenant (Production)

pages.purpose: Overview of the multiple ways users can interact with Matrix OS: web, CLI, and messaging platforms
pages.title: User Interfaces

pages.purpose: Detailed documentation of the web-based desktop environment: window management, chat interface, InputBar with voice, TaskBoard/MissionControl, and responsive design
pages.title: Web Shell

pages.purpose: Command-line interface documentation: matrixos start/send/status/doctor commands, argument parsing, and integration with gateway API
pages.title: CLI

pages.purpose: How Matrix OS integrates with messaging platforms: ChannelManager, adapter pattern, Telegram/Discord/WhatsApp/Slack implementations, and message formatting
pages.title: Multi-Channel Support

pages.purpose: Introduction to the agent architecture: how agents are defined, tool access patterns, and spawning subagents
pages.title: Agent System

pages.purpose: Document the 5 built-in agents: Builder (creates apps), Healer (auto-repairs), Researcher (gathers info), Deployer (manages modules), Evolver (grows capabilities)
pages.title: Core Agents

pages.purpose: Guide for creating user-defined agents: markdown format with YAML frontmatter, specifying tools/model/maxTurns, and loading from ~/agents/custom/
pages.title: Custom Agents

pages.purpose: Explain the skills system: markdown files with triggers, load_skill IPC tool, skill TOC injection, and 13 starter skills
pages.title: Skills System

pages.purpose: Overview of how Matrix OS stores data: file system structure, SQLite database, and memory system
pages.title: Data & Persistence

pages.purpose: Document the ~/matrixos/ directory structure: system/ config files, agents/ definitions, apps/ and modules/, data/ storage, and .backup/ snapshots
pages.title: File System

pages.purpose: SQLite schema documentation: tasks table (workflow queue), messages table (inter-agent communication), and memories table structure
pages.title: Database Schema

pages.purpose: RAG memory system: remember/recall/forget IPC tools, FTS5 full-text search, auto-extraction from conversations, 300 token cap, and categorization (preference/fact/instruction)
pages.title: Memory System

pages.purpose: Overview of the www/ Next.js application: landing page, authentication flow, user/admin dashboards
pages.title: Public Website

pages.purpose: Document the marketing site: LandingPage component structure, feature showcase, agent introduction, bento grid, Web 4 vision, and whitepaper
pages.title: Landing & Marketing

pages.purpose: Clerk integration: sign-up/sign-in flows, AuthLayout component, FeatureShowcase carousel, webhook handling, and protected routes
pages.title: Authentication

pages.purpose: User-facing dashboard: DashboardPage component, container status display (running/stopped/not_provisioned), ProvisionButton, and instance access URLs
pages.title: User Dashboard

pages.purpose: Administrative interface: AdminDashboard component, container list, start/stop/destroy actions, PostHog tracking, and system monitoring
pages.title: Admin Dashboard

pages.purpose: Overview of key user-facing features and capabilities built into Matrix OS
pages.title: Features

pages.purpose: Application discovery and installation: AppStore component, FALLBACK_CATALOG, featured carousel, bundled vs prompt apps, installation flow, and useAppStore state
pages.title: App Store

pages.purpose: Speech-to-text and text-to-speech: VoiceService with ElevenLabs, useVoice hook, InputBar microphone, WebSocket /ws/voice endpoint, and cost tracking
pages.title: Voice Integration

pages.purpose: Conversation management: new_conversation IPC tool, session switching, ConversationStore, search across conversations, and persistence to ~/system/conversations/
pages.title: Multi-Session & Conversations
